Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Extreme Class allies' ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When another 3 or more "Crossover" Category allies are on
the team*
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (STR
excluded) to STR Ki Spheres
*With a STR Ki Sphere obtained*
- ATK 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every STR or Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained (whichever
Ki Sphere is collected more will be counted)*
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 10%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 50%)
- Extreme Class allies' Ki +1 (up to +5) and ATK & DEF 4%{passiveImg:up_g} (up
to 20%)

5031.superDescription:
Raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes supreme damage to enemy 
and seals Super Attack
